titleStmt.title: A new-years gift: being an help to heart-converse by way of charge and challenge: In morning excitation, and evening examination. Alphabetically digested for the help of memory. by J.C. M.A. Decemb. 27. 1689. This may be printed. Rob. Midgley.
titleStmt.author: J. C.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Tho. Parkhurst at the Bible and Three Crowns in Cheapside near Mercers Chapel,

notesStmt.note: Two poems divided by a column of biblical references.
Imperfect: copy cut and torn affecting text.
Reproduction of original in: British Library.
